channel.title: How do you get a foreign scholarship if you weren't born in that foreign country
channel.description: Before you say this is a Obama question...I'm just wondering how the H E L L he got a foreign scholarship for being born in the United States..Not trying to get a riot, but when I ask my stepmom which she is a democrat and Obama donator plus a teacher..she can't answer and says "you are turning into your dad.".., so can some explain how he got one and how I might get one lol

item.title: How do you get a foreign scholarship if you weren't born in that foreign country
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

well ain’t that a loaded question and a half

Snopes.com

FALSE: Barack Obama Was a Foreign College Student

Recently released records do not document that Barack Obama received college financial aid in the U.S. as a 'foreign student from Indonesia.'

Read full topic
item.source: How do you get a foreign scholarship if you weren't born in that foreign country
